attributes.action: Stop people on Benefits getting extortionatly priced private houses paid for by the Benefits office. In some cases £900 a week !
attributes.additional_details: I feel it aborant that tax payers should pay for people on benefits , who have large families , get housed in Large costly houses. A more recent example being a Samalian family , moving to a house in Kensington worth £2m at a cost of £900 a week because they didnt like the area they were in . How many working , taxpayers would love to move into bigger better hoses in better areas, near better schools , but cant because they dont earn enough. It's just wrong on every level and needs to be adressed if the Government are serious about cutting its benefits defecit.
